alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 12:49PM MST until March 09 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Localized wind gusts of 20 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Johnson County. * WHEN...From 5 PM Wednesday to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Patchy blowing snow will reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
